title: el_rlee
author: el_rlee
content: I would like to short BNB. Can I do that anywhere? eToro offers a CFD, but I'm afraid as soon as shit gets serious they pull out... Does anybody know of a better way? Thanks!

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: Quote from: el_rlee on November 12, 2023, 06:44:54 PMI would like to short BNB. Can I do that anywhere? eToro offers a CFD, but I'm afraid as soon as shit gets serious they pull out... Does anybody know of a better way? Thanks!Binance is the best place to short since it’s their native utility token. Do you have any specific preference on the exchange you are using since it’s odd that you missed the most popular exchange to short it for e-Toro exchange that is not originally crypto exchange.Dydx offers decentralized perp trading but I don’t see BNB in there just in case you are looking for exchange that doesn’t require KYC.

comments.author: el_rlee
comments.body: Binance as a provider makes little sense if what you are betting on is binance doing the "FTX"... KYC is not a concern - the opposite is the case, the more regulated and trustworthy the exchange/brokerage, the better.I guess there is nothing like a smart crypto swap with btc/eth as collateral?
